lead_paragraph: RACHLIN--Lauren D.,(1929-2016) was a lifelong champion of US and Canadian economic integration and international law. Over his 64-year-long legal career, he was a mentor, guide, and teacher to generations of young lawyers. An avid adventurer, Lauren visited more than 30 countries with his wife, Jean (nee Karet), and his sister, Nancy Posluns. His children, grandchildren, nieces and nephews were his pride and joy. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RACHLIN, LAUREN D.
